entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT, Naujaat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:29 AM CDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -21.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Naujaat 08:00 AM CDT Thursday 21 April 2016
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -21.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -24.9°C
Wind: NNW 52 km/h gust 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 this morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow with visibilities at times less than 2 kilometres late this evening and overnight. Wind north 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 28. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Thursday 21 April 2016
